short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Injects an audio player with bloomberg columnist Matt Levine's voice into his daily opinion piece 'Money Stuff'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Injects an audio player with Bloomberg columnist Matt Levine's voice into his daily opinion piece 'Money Stuff'. Quotes are read in Bloomberg News reporter Katie Greifeld's voice, his co-star on the Money Stuff podcast.

Features:
- Hands-free: automatically goes to and starts the next section
- Modern sound player features: +-10 seconds, 1.5x speed, etc
- Smooth scrolling between sections

Only works at the following website, provided you have a Bloomberg subscription: https://www.bloomberg.com/opinion/authors/ARbTQlRLRjE/matthew-s-levine
